text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

section.section: "Contract" means an agreement of any kind or nature, express or implied, for doing work or furnishing materials, or both, for or about a building.

text.section: "Contractor" means a person who has a contract with an owner.

"Owner" means:
The owner of the land; or
An owner's tenant for life or for years, provided the tenant enters into the contract with the contractor.

section.section: "Subcontractor" means a person who has a contract with anyone except the owner or the owner's agent.

text.section: "Undisputed amount" means an amount owed on a contract for which there is no good faith dispute, including any retainage withheld.
